description: FIGURES 272–280. Calapnita nunezae sp. nov., SEM micrographs (ZFMK, Ar 16064–65). 272–273. Male cheliceral apophyses. 274. Right genital bulb, prolateral view. 275–276. Tip of left procursus, retrolateral and retrolatero-ventral views. 277. Comb-hairs on tarsus 4. 278–279. Male and female ALS. 280. Epigynum, ventral view. a, appendix; b, genital bulb; e, embolus. Scale lines: 10 µm (272, 273, 277–279), 100 µm (274–276, 280).
name: FIGURES 272–280 in Revision and cladistic analysis of the Southeast Asian leaf-dwelling spider genus Calapnita Simon (Araneae, Pholcidae)
